title: Glamorama
description: The centre of the world: 1990s Manhattan. Victor Ward, a model with perfect abs and all the right friends, is seen and photographed everywhere, even in places he hasn't been and with people he doesn't know. He's living with one beautiful model and having an affair with another one, on the eve of opening the trendiest nightclub in New York's history. Now it's time to move to the next stage. But the future Victor gets is not the one he had in mind.
author: Bret Easton Ellis
